title: am in Palestine  can i still join o-o ?
body:
Hello,
I play in EUW  In league of Legends ,But in real life I Live in  Palestine, Israel .
Am i  Still allowed to  join  the tournament   ?  i am 19 years old  . 

Thanks .

replies.body: No. Only people living in austria, switzerland or germany are eligible.

sure u can join! If you can play with a stable Connection.
You are Welcome! :)

No, that's not true. 
As afkcuzbookiscool said, only people from Austria, Switzerland and Germany are allowed to play in this tournament.

If someone is not from these three countries, there still are tournaments for them on the [Community Events page](https://events.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/) but the Vienna Challengers Arena is specifially for people from these three countries.
